summary: This mod reduces the cooldown for the Whirlwind Sprint dragon shout to 1 seconds, for all three words of the shout.
descriptionHtml:
This mod reduces the cooldown for the Whirlwind Sprint dragon shout to 1 seconds, for all three words of the shout. So you can spam Whirlwind Sprint and don\'t need to use horses or run anymore.

The first version of this mod is from [url=
http://www.curse.com/mods/skyrim/whirlwind-sprint-less-recharge-t]http://www.curse.com/mods/skyrim/whirlwind-sprint-less-recharge-t[/url]
I improved the mod so there is no more blurring while charging, and I removed images that came with the original mod.

But it was weird for me that I couldn\'t find it on this site, so I uploaded it here.
I find it very useful that whirlwind sprint\'s recharge is almost nothing, since the Dragonborn is a medieval superman, breaths fire and kills dragons, he should be able to run like the Flash or something.

Works well with [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34088/]Whirlwind Sprint with Force[/url].

How to install:
Just extract the zip directly into the Skyrim directory, or use NMM.
author: CaoMengde777 and Bluezone

files.name: Whirlwind Sprint Recharge Time 1 secs No blur
files.fileName: Whirlwind Sprint Recharge Time 1 secs No blur-33578-v1a.zip
